item.title: Sade Live from chicago ( a mobile phone movie 30 mins long )
item.description: Sade came to Chicago to do 3 sold out shows in row This footage from sunday august 7th 2011 that was the last night she was here... This is a short mobile phone movie chiradio Films did is completely done with the cell phone footage that djelove ( he is a big fan of her music) took from the 5th row center. ( some of it is a little shaky and out of focus and her head was cut out in a few frames cus I think he was checking out her body lol. Sade looks amazing at 50+ years of age ) the running time for this short mobile phone movie is approx 35 mins. and is 400 mb so it might take a min to download i would strongly suggest to just stream it. The songs in the short movie we made is The ones we all grew up on, The Sade Classics she made back in the 90's like... your love is king kiss of life is it a crime stronger than pride Paradise nothing can come between us cherish the day pearls When sade comes to your town you should really go see her live cus If your a fan I swear you will love it. I hear there will be a real DVD coming out soon and im sure that will one be closer to 2hours in 3D and HD this again is just our little fan made black and white mobile-phone movie no copyright claim intended here, We just made it to remember the night we spent with SADE in chicago and to let our chiradio.com friends & family check it out. I hope this brightens up your day cus 2 days later we are all still smiling from being in the same room with her with 30,000 fans at the United Center in chicago IL. this is not our best work but I hope you enjoy it. from the chiradio.com staff

item.title: Shala.'s Gety Radio • Episode 6 • Enter: Hip Hop . . . What To Play When She Leaves. Volume 1
item.description: Gety Coolture is a lifestyle of cultured artisan wears, music and expression. Characterized by a fusion of soul, punk sub-cultures, third world values, an appreciation for antiques and a life of privilege, this culture will dominate popular culture in the next 5 years. The fundamental principles of this lifestyle movement are power, freedom and self expression. It is sovereign and uncensored. This is our soundtrack . . . 1. Cyhi The Prince f. Pill & Pusha T • Thousand Poundz 2. Drake • 9AM In Dallas 3. Wiz Khalifa, Curren$y & Big Sean • Proceed 4. Remy Banks & Hannibal King f. Domo Genesis • More Clouds 5. Wiz Khalifa, Curren$y & Big Sean • OTTR 6. Curren$y • Full Metal 7. Jay-Z X Beewirks • Fallin' (Beewirks Remix) 8. Shala. • I'm Just Sayin'. . . (freestyle) 9. Cyhi The Prince f. Tity Boi • Emotional 10. Curren$y • Scottie Pippens f. Freddie Gibbs 11. Shala. • Lemme Holla at You 12. Tyler, The Creator f. Hodgy Beats • French! 13. Talib Kweli f. Jean Grae • Outtasight 14. E-40 • The Server 15. Andre 3000 • I Do 16. Shala. • The Gety 17. Nicki Minaj • Kill The DJ 18. Lil Wayne • Gucci Gucci (Freestyle) 19. Lil Wayne • Dear Anne (Stan Pt. 2) Music curated by Shala.

item.title: Mike Love show -Classic Chicago juke Music Mixtape part 1
item.description: hello world, If you ever been to Chicago then U know about Chicago juke music. It kind of like B-more house but slightly different. More a 4 track style of music. 3 tracks for the drums bass and sample one additional track for the vocals. It is the fun Summer music we listen 2 in the hood be4 Gucci Mane and Young Jeezy & KanYe. This Mix is a flashback ghettohouse/juke mix. we are going back 2 the roots of chicago juke/ghetto house music. Now If you never heard it b4 you will love it if you have never heard it is a must have for your Chicago music collection. This 30 min mix was put together by non other than MIKE Love Aka Mr cold as hell. go to chiradio.com join up & get New music and news daily....

item.title: The Strobe Episode10 (feat New Music from LIL LOUIS)
item.description: Some of you might not know about Lil Louis. He is a legend in Chicago. This Guy is dj a remixer promoter record label Owner and had the sexy ladies at his parties. Back in the day when there was a Big House movement in Chicago he was considered the diplomat. People from the whole midwest would come out to his events at the peek of his Diamond Corp days.(that was his label and promotion company He moved on from Chicago to different spaces and places across the globe. The Last time I heard this Guy spin in Chicago It was at the Crobar a few years Back and he said on the mic that he was hanging up his headphones... Well he did keep to his word but to write a book and Make a New Double Disk CD called "LIL LOUIS-TWO SIDES TO EVERY STORY" On this Podcast we will hit you with a hour of The new music of Lil Louis. hosted by djelove check out www.lil-louis.com to cop his New CD
item.dc:creator: chiRadio.com podcast

Lil' Wayne) Lyrics (Verse 1 : Kevin Rudolph) I see your dirty face Hide behind your collar What is done in vain Truth is hard to swallow So you pray to God To justify the way you live a lie, live a lie, live a lie And you take your time And you do your crime Well you made your bed I'm in mine (Chorus) Because when I arrive I bring the fire Make you come alive I can take you higher What is this, forgot? I must now remind you Let It Rock Let It Rock Let It Rock (Verse 2: Kevin Rudolph) Now the son's disgraced He, who knew his father When he cursed his name Turned, and chased the dollar But it broke his heart So he stuck his middle finger To the world To the world To the world And you take your time And you stand in line Well you'll get what's yours I got mine Chorus: Because when I arrive I bring the fire Make you come alive I can take you higher What is this, forgot? I must now remind you Let It Rock Let It Rock Let It Rock (Verse 3: Lil' Wayne) Yeah! Wayne's world Planet Rock Panties drop And the top And she gonna rock 'til the camera stops And I sing about angels like angela (Rock) And Pamela (Rock) And Samantha (Rock) And Tamara And Amanda ?-******* Im in here up like bitch what's up Mechanic, me, I can fix you up I can lick you up I can lick you down Shorty we can go wherever just pick a town And the jewelry is louder than an an engine sound Big as rocks like on the ground Dirty like socks that's on the ground Chorus: (Kevin Rudolph) Because when I arrive I bring the fire Make you come alive I can take you higher What is this, forgot? I must now remind you Let It Rock Let It Rock Let It Rock Let It Rock Let It Rock Let It Rock Just Let It Rock Let It Rock Let It Rock Let It Rock Let It Rock Let It Rock Let It Rock (Verse 4:Lil' Wayne) I'm back like I forgot somethin' I'm somethin Rulin' rock rubbin' rap runnin' Miles like I'm trying to get a flat stomach Like Wayne the personal trainer My aim is perfect I'll bang ya Period, Like the remainder (Bridge: Kevin Rudolph) I wish I could be As cool as you And I wish I could say The things you do But I can't and I won't live a lie No not this time 4 more remixes by djelove check out www.djelove.com

item.title: djelove presents beats remixes and instrumentals volume 1
item.description:
djelove is on a personal leave right now due to the fact he dislocated his shoulder and some of his close friends have died in the last couple of weeks but we have put together a mixshow of his orginal beats.
Fyi Djelove has made over 100 orginal beats on his chiradio.com mixshows in the past 8 years. He has @ times done an exclusive remix for the listeners. We have included a couple of those remixes in this podcast.
With his permission we are putting over 20 orginal beats on this podcast.
In the earlier years around 2002 2003 Dj elove had a co host his name was Octogon molitti. There is a beat djelove was making live while Octogon was a Guest host & We even added that on there as well. We hope you enjoy the podcast
djelove we miss you get better. Happy holidays from the chiradio.com networks
visit his myspace page www.myspace.com/djericlove

In the earlier years around 2002 2003 Dj elove had a co host his name was Octogon molitti. There is a beat djelove was making live while Octogon was a Guest host & We even added that on there as well. We hope you enjoy the podcast
djelove we miss you get better. Happy holidays from the chiradio.com networks
visit his myspace page www.myspace.com/djericlove

item.title: The mike love show episode 4 ( xclusive FREESTYLE show)
item.description: this MIKe LOVE show was personal . It took 10 years to make, It is all exclusive content, With freestyles from every one from 50 cent, Kanye, common & the NBA basket ball player Allen Iverson. while working as the Number radio on air personality he interviewed all these artists and got them to do freestyles and you can hear the best of his Carrer all on one podcast. This Mike Love show features co host Tommy Staxxx So sit back relax & enJoy.
